title: My Heart Belongs in Galveston, Texas: Madeline's Search
description: Dodging bullets takes a simple missing person case to a new level as Jonah Cahill, a Pinkerton agent, and Madeline Latour, an investigative reporter, form a tentative truce in Galveston, Texas, 1880. Are they on to a much bigger story when their best witness is suddenly kidnapped?
author: Kathleen Y'Barbo
